attributes.additional_details:
(1K characters wit spaces so I’ll b txt spk, soz)

Greek lived in UK 10y now, highly political,paid all taxes, dntdnt want sham-marriage 2 get vote.

Only other way is to pass the Citizenship test-80%-90% of Yous failed, (as seen on Ch 4’s ‘Make Bradford British’).I believe the test is on purpose discriminating against non-British citizens:
In which [exact] year did married women get the right to divorce their husband? NO, not an Andrew Neil mug competition.

Ulster Scots is a dialect which is spoken in Northern Ireland. (btw... by less than 0.2% of UK)
Now asks yourselves Do I need to know this, to get my 10y vote. IS THIS FAIR?

These amongst MANY other errors in the test make it de-facto discriminatory &prevent me from my simple, hard-earned vote.

Pls support my application: the right 2 vote should b given 2 anyone who is a permanent resident of the UK and pays any amount of taxes. If you disagree, I challenge u 2 the test.Sof
http://www.ukcitizenshiptest.co.uk/
